QuestData.Title: Big Hunter Mon
QuestData.Description:
In these valleys, the Mon be kepin' beasts alive only to serve as sport. For his entertainment.
The lives of others not be so cheap. Even the smallest creature can cause a whole lotta trouble. The Mon gonna be learnin' to respect that.
I think this be a good time to teach this Big Hunter Mon a lesson, don't you? Be you my faithful messenger?
QuestData.LogDescription:
Survive Jani's prank on Nesingwary.
If you lose your saurid disguise, return to Jani for another.

Objectives.Objective: Wait for Nesingwary to trigger stink bombs
